title: Why is this umkool so obsessed with pes ( laughter ahead )

comments.body: Dorei’s secret account lmao
Frr
Sir is a professional rider
Doraswamis nephew
Really Or a /s?
Show this during your interviews👍
aye he's one troll account. He always keeps giving this goofy takes on Bengaluru related things. There was a time when he was only tweeting sudha murthy so simple threads
Bro's trolling so hard 😭
What about BMS mech?
Dm him dude.. Id is visible right..
lmao I unfollowed during that simple cotton saree phase
Mass marketing by pes chomus
Even rvce and msrit are marketing?
well they might have contributed some part too !!
PESexual
He was once really active on a crackhead quizzing group on Facebook. Much better with memes and trolling than the professionals
He is definitely trolling us. Every tweet feels sarcastic, I’m sure he is not obsessed. But feels like OP is more butt hurt.

>But feels like OP is more butt hurt.

I'd actually feel happier if my clg performs better 😭.. Why will my butt hurt if my clg is better lmao

Makes sense, just did not understand the need for the over exaggerated title. There are two PoVs, either you’re from PES and feel happy or you’re from one of the IITs, NITs, BITS making fun of the institution. That opinion is from the title btw.
I left nit Surathkal for pes.. The statements that the guy made are top good to be true, but that isn't possible right..

That’s why it’s called satire. Also, saying that you left a university for another just makes you a person that is actually uninterested in PES. 

You didn’t get a branch that you wanted, that’s not leaving a college. If you got CS at NIT, then moved here for CS, that is leaving a college for another. You chose this university with all sanity. Be proud of it.

>If you got CS at NIT, then moved here for CS

I could have actually got cse , but in lower nits which are shittier than pes.. And i don't actually have a problem with pes.. I'm in fact happy for getting pes thru cet where the fee is 5l for the whole four years.. 

And coming to this post, this was actually a shit post made for fun and i have nothing to demean pes (why will i even do this)
Pesit is better than CMU?! Then AIT is better than MIT.
MIT B solos
Shitposter in X
